title: What has Coleen Rooney accused Rebekah Vardy of doing on Instagram?
text:
Coleen Rooney has sparked a social media feud with Rebekah Vardy (Picture: Getty/|REX)

Hold onto your hats Twitter and Instagram followers of Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy, there is a social media storm brewing and it’s a doozy.

This morning, Wednesday October 9, Coleen took to her official Twitter account to accuse her fellow WAG Rebekah of betraying her.

Outing the pregnant mum-of-four publicly, a fed-up and frustrated Coleen explained to all of her social media followers exactly why she’s so furious at Rebekah.

But what exactly has Coleen accused Rebekah of and how has she allegedly been betrayed by her former pal?

What has Coleen Rooney accused Rebekah Vardy of doing?

Coleen took to her Twitter account this morning to accuse Rebekah of selling stories about her to the press.

Making her grievance with Rebekah public she wrote: ‘For a few years now someone I trusted to follow me on my personal Instagram account has been consistently informing The Sun newspaper of my private posts and stories.

Coleen Rooney published this message on her Twitter account on Wednesday morning (Picture: Twitter)

‘There has been so much information given to them about me, my friends and my family – all without my permission or knowledge. After a long time of trying to figure out who it could be, for various reasons, I had a suspicion.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Coleen went on to explain that in order to get to the bottom of who was sharing her private information, she planted a series of fake stories on her Instagram, such as the story she was planning to return to TV and how her new house had flooded.

WAGs Coleen and Rebekah crossed paths at football matches when their husbands were playing (Picture: Mark Large/Daily Mail/REX/Shutterstock)

This morning, the 33-year-old revealed that all of those stories had been fake and used by the mum-of-four as a way to discover who was selling news about her private life to the press.

Coleen continued: ‘To try and prove this, I came up with an idea. I blocked everyone from viewing my Instagram stories except ONE account. (Those on my private account must have been wondering why I haven’t had stories on there for a while.)

‘Over the past five months I have posted a series of false stories if they made their way into the Sun newspaper. And you know what, they did! The story about gender selection in Mexico, the story about returning to TV and then the latest story about the basement flooding in my new house.

Coleen has been overseeing building work on the family home she will share with Wayne and their children – but reports that it had flooded were fake (Picture: BACKGRID)

‘It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however I had to. Now I know for certain which account/individual it’s come from.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them. It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

Coleen, who is married to footballer Wayne Rooney, captioned the statement: ‘This has been a burden in my life for a few years now and finally I have got to the bottom of it……’

Coleen has accused Rebekah Vardy of being the one to leak information about her to the press (Picture: S Meddle/ITV/REX)

Rebekah Vardy’s response to Coleen’s accusations

Rebekah, who is currently on holiday in Dubai and heavily pregnant with her fifth child, responded to Coleen’s claims with her own post on social media.

Taking to Instagram, 37-year-old Rebekah categorically denied the claims, writing: ‘As I have just said to you on the phone, I wish you had called me if you thought this.

Coleen claims she tricked Rebekah with her Instagram stories (Picture: Michael Zemanek/BPI/REX)

‘I never speak to anyone about you as various journalists who have asked me to over the years can vouch for.

‘If you thought this was happening you could have told me and I could have changed my passwords to see if it stopped.

‘Over the years various people have had access to my insta & just this week I found I was following people I didn’t know and have never followed myself.

‘I’m not being funny but I don’t need the money, what would I gain from selling stories on you?

Advertisement

‘I like you a lot Coleen & I’m so upset that you have chosen to do this, especially when I’m heavily pregnant.

Rebekah has denied the allegations (Picture: Jean Catuffe/Getty Images)

‘I’m disgusted that I’m even having to deny this. You should have called me the first time this happened.’

Captioning the typed statement, Rebekah said that she felt extremely stressed by Coleen’s accusations and was going to consult lawyers on the matter.

‘Can’t believe I’m even having to write this. I’m pregnant & on holiday & am at a loss to why she would do this,’ Rebekah wrote to her 377,000 followers.

Sorry, this video isn't available any more.

In response to the unfolding drama between the two women, social media has erupted with comments and memes as people read the war of words between the two WAGs.

Even Netflix has got in on the action, by jokingly tweeting: ‘We’re going to have to make a documentary about this, aren’t we.’

Coleen is yet to respond publicly to Rebekah’s statement on social media.

description: This morning Coleen Rooney took to her official Twitter account to accuse her fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy of betraying her, but how?
